00030 struct brush_style {

00033         null,

00039         dib_pattern_pt,
00040         pattern_8x8,

00042         mono_pattern
00043     };
00044 };

00082 struct brush_base : resource_top {
00083     typedef resource_top::id_type_ptr id_type_ptr;
00084     typedef resource_top::id_type id_type;
00085     typedef resource_top::do_clone do_clone;
00086 protected:
00087     brush_base(id_type_ptr p) ;
00088     brush_base(id_type id = 0);
00089     template<class other> brush_base(const other & o, const do_clone& c) : resource_top(o, c) {}
00090 public:
00091 
00092     types::color color() const ;
00093         void color(types::color cr) ;
00094 
00095     brush_style::type style() const;
00096     void style(brush_style::type s);
00097 
00098     static temporary_brush sys_color_brush(sys_color::type idx) ;
00099 };
00100 
00101 struct temporary_brush : resource<temporary_brush, brush, brush_base> {
00102     typedef resource<temporary_brush, brush, brush_base> base_type;
00103     temporary_brush(id_type id);
00104     temporary_brush(const brush& src);
00105 };
00106 
00107 struct brush : resource<brush, temporary_brush, brush_base> {
00108     typedef resource<brush, temporary_brush, brush_base> base_type;
00109 
00110     // always copying a resource object used by clients (i.e., not temporary), will clone the original object
00111     brush(const brush & other) : base_type( other.clone() ) {}
00112 
00113     brush(const temporary_brush & other);
00114 
00115     static temporary_brush solid_brush(types::color c);
00116 };
